name: The7bits
tagline: We build startups and custom web based solutions
description:
The7bits is a small company founded by the team of geeks for making cool things. Our expertise is building startups and custom software solutions for wide range of customers. We also have years of experience in e-commerce.
Our services:
Web app development: Python/Django.
Adobe Business Catalyst: app development, integrations with third-party services, custom solutions.
JS development: Backbone.js, AngularJS.
Startup co-development.
